Class AddApptController

java.lang.Object
AppSch.Controller.AddApptController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddApptController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class contains the controller functions for the Add Appointment screen.

      void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

    • onActionSaveAppt

      void onActionSaveAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method inserts the appointment to the "appointments" table in the MySql DB. And returns to Appointment Main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the submit button is clicked
